titles.title: Calling for the resignation and disbarment of United States Attorney General William P. Barr, and for other purposes.
Calling for the resignation and disbarment of United States Attorney General William P. Barr, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution (1) condemns Attorney General William Barr for his comments and actions; (2) calls on Barr to resign; (3) calls on the Virginia State Bar, the New York State Bar Association, and the District of Columbia Bar to remove Barr from its rolls; and (4) reaffirms support for the diversity of the United States and for the 14th Amendment.
